com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class WSubMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractContainer
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractNamingContextContainer
          • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WSubMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Container, Disableable, NamingContextable, WComponent, WebComponent, Serializable

    public class WSubMenu
extends AbstractNamingContextContainer
implements Disableable

    This component is used to provide either a dropmenu (when added directly to a WMenu or nestable sub menus (when added to another WSubMenu instance).

    Sub Menus may contain the following components:

    • Other sub menus.
    • Menu items (WMenuItem)
    • Menu separators (see addSeparator())

    Actions on sub-menus are only supported for WMenu.MenuType.COLUMN menus.

    Author:
    Adam Millard, Yiannis Paschalidis - re-written to not extend WButton.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
